com.bumptech.glide.provider

Class ResourceEncoderRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.provider.ResourceEncoderRegistry

  • public class ResourceEncoderRegistry
extends Object
    Contains an unordered list of ResourceEncoders capable of encoding arbitrary resource types.
